com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server
Interface IPublishingEngine

All Superinterfaces:
com.kuka.roboticsAPI.IEngine
All Known Implementing Classes:
PublishingEngine
public interface IPublishingEngine
extends com.kuka.roboticsAPI.IEngine

Interface of the PublishingEngine.
This engine is used to provide information about the objects used in an application over the network.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getAllHostingTechnologyNames

java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> getAllHostingTechnologyNames()
Iterate over the names of all known hosting technologies.
The implementation of a hosting technology is hidden.

Returns:
an iteration over the hosting technology names.

getAllServiceTypes

java.lang.Iterable<ServiceType> getAllServiceTypes()
Iterate over all all known service types.

Returns:
an iteration over the service configurations.

getServiceType

ServiceType getServiceType(java.lang.String serviceTypeName)
Get a ServiceType object that contains the static information from the configuration.

Parameters:
serviceTypeName - The name of the service type in the configuration
Returns:
A ServiceType object for that configuration item or null if the service type name is not known

publish

AbstractServiceBase publish(java.lang.Object publishedObject,
                            java.lang.String serviceTypeName,
                            java.lang.String publishedName)
Publish a new service instance of a given service type.
The engine creates a new service implementation instance for the given published object.

Parameters:
publishedObject - The object that is exposed by the service instance
serviceTypeName - The name of the service type in the configuration
publishedName - The unique name of the service instance.
Returns:
The service implementation

removeService

void removeService(java.lang.String publishedName)
Remove the service with the given instance name and dispose the service implementation.
If no service instance with the given name is found, nothing happens.

Parameters:
publishedName - The name under which the service instance was published

getService

AbstractServiceBase getService(java.lang.String publishedName)
Get the service implementation instance for a given name.

Parameters:
publishedName - The name under which the service instance was published
Returns:
The service implementation

getAllServices

java.lang.Iterable<AbstractServiceBase> getAllServices()
Iterate over all published service implementation instances.
The ordering is not defined.

Returns:
An iteration over the service implementations
